0011011001011100 1010000010101101 0 -> sum: 1101011100001001, cout: 0
1101000101101100 1100100001010011 1 -> sum: 1001100111000000, cout: 1

0010110010011101 0010101111110101 0 -> sum: 0101100010010010, cout: 0

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
